result.execSummary:
Charge(s) in this case were read in to this or other case(s). A "read in" charge is a charge that is dismissed as part of a plea agreement, however:

  • The defendant agrees to have the court consider the charge(s) when sentencing for another crime, under Wis. Stats. 973.20(1g)(b); and
  • The defendant cannot be prosecuted for these charge(s) in the future.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Aaron M Erdmann

defendant.name: Erdmann, Aaron M
defendant.address: 571 County Road A, C/O Green Lake County Jail, Green Lake, WI 54941

records.descr: Records of prosec. are converted data. See file.

records.addlTxt: from the defendant with new mailing address for the poster of the bond
to the defendant - refund check has been returned.  Please supply poster's address to our office.

ADDRESS INFO for Aaron M Erdmann
Current: 571 County Road A, C/O Green Lake County Jail, Green Lake, WI 54941 United States  (Effective: 06-12-2015)
Prior: 63 Western Ave, C/O Fond du lac County Jail, Fond du Lac, WI 54935 United States
to the defendant requesting a valid mailing address for the poster of the cash bond
Refund check sent to the poster has been returned.  Return to sender.  Not Deliverable as addressed.  Unable to Forward.

10:21 a.m.  Defendant in custody and present in court with Atty Jeffrey Haase.  Lisa Vanden Branden for the State of Wisconsin.  Atty Haase recites agreement - 2014CF8 defendant will plea to counts 1 & 2. 2014CF9 - defendant will plea to count 1. 2014CF10 - defendant will plea to count 1.  2014CM27 and 2014CF86 are to be dismissed and read-in and parties request a PSI.  ADA concurs.  Defendant concurs.  Court goes over plea questionnaire with the defendant.  Court goes over constitutional rights with the defendant - defendant waives these rights.  Court goes over the elements of each offense.  Court instructs defendant of the maximum penalty.  Court instructs defendant regarding deportation.  (If felony) Court instructs regarding felony prohibitions.

Defendant enters a plea of NO CONTEST to counts 1 & 2 on 2014CF8, count 1 on 2014CF9 & count 1 on 2014CF10.  Court finds the plea is made freely, voluntarily, intelligently and understandingly.  Court finds there is a factual basis to support the plea.  Court finds the defendant guilty on counts 1 on 2014CF10, count 1 on 2014.  Court orders the balance of the counts and 2014CM27 & 2014CF86 be dismissed and read-in.  Court orders the judgment of conviction be entered here today.  Court orders a pre-sentence investigation be conducted and filed with the court within 60 days and sentencing is to be scheduled thereafter.  

Statement by ADA - has received correspondence from the victims requesting bond be modified on 2014CF8 to allow contact with the victims.  Court amends the bond to allow contact.  All other conditions remain the same.

Statement by Atty Haase - defendant's mother is here and would like to say something.  Statement by Carla in regards to the bond - requests it be returned back to her.  No objection by ADA on 14CF10 to convert to a signature bond.  No obection by Atty Haase.  Court amends bond on 14CF10 to a $500 signature bond and the cash bond be returned to the poster.

Court adjourned at 10:33 a.m.
Fond du lac County Jail - 11/11/2014 at 9:30 a.m. (Plea Hearing)
Status hearing on November 11, 2014 at 10:00 am.

ADDRESS INFO for Aaron M Erdmann
Current: 63 Western Ave, C/O Fond du lac County Jail, Fond du Lac, WI 54935 United States  (Effective: 10-14-2014)
Prior: 464 Scott St, Ripon, WI 54971 United States

10:58 a.m.  State by ADA Lisa Vanden Branden.  No appearance by the defendant.  Attorney Jeffrey Haase present on behalf of the defendant  (except 2014CF86).

Statement by Attorney Haase - defendant in custody in Fond du Lac County unable to post a cash bond - represents the defendant on that charge.

Court directs all cases be set for Status Hearing to be held in approximately thirty days.

Court adjourned at 11:00 a.m.
Plea hearing on October 14, 2014 at 10:30 am.
Status hearing on September 8, 2014 at 10:00 am.

ADDRESS INFO for Aaron M Erdmann
Current: 464 Scott St, Ripon, WI 54971 United States  (Effective: 08-18-2014)
Prior: 540 Sacramento St, Berlin, WI 54923

2:59 p.m.  State by DA Andrew Christenson.  Defendant present in custody and via video from Green Lake County Jail and without an attorney.

Defendant confirms receipt of the complaint - waives reading.  Court instructs regarding maximum penalties on each count.  Court finds probable cause.  Court instructs defendant of his right to an attorney.    Court orders bond be continued.  Court instructs defendant of his right to a preliminary hearing and it's time limits.  Defendant waives the time limits as to the preliminary hearing.  Court directs Status Hearing, regarding counsel, to be held in approximately two weeks.

Court adjourned at 3:03 p.m.

1:03 p.m.  Defendant in custody and present in court via video from the Green Lake County Jail.  Andrew Christenson for the State of Wisconsin.  Court questions defendant regarding residence.  DA makes bond recommendation.  Court orders bond set at $100.00 cash bond.  Initial Appearance on 09/15/2014 at 9:30 a.m.

Court adjourned at 1:13 p.m.
